===============
SGOSSPRDO2PDB01
===============

CREATE USER 'o2preport'@'172.26.14.147' IDENTIFIED BY 'Orion_123';

GRANT USAGE ON *.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.147`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `o2pprod`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.147`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `o2pstaging`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.147`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `pegasusmulesoft`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.147`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE, DROP, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `o2ptableau`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.147`;
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON `o2ptest`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.147`;

SHOW GRANTS FOR o2preport@172.26.14.147;

SGOSSPRDO2PAPP01
mysql -u o2preport -h 172.26.14.148 -P 3306 o2ptest -p

REMOTE (SSH TUNNEL):
mysql -u o2preport -h 127.0.0.1 -P 53306 o2ptest -p


===============
SGOSSUATO2PDB01
===============

CREATE USER 'o2preport'@'172.26.14.141' IDENTIFIED BY 'Orion_123';

GRANT USAGE ON *.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.141`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `o2puat`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.141`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `o2pstaging`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.141`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `pegasusmulesoft`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.141`;
GRANT SELECT, CREATE, DROP, CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES ON `o2ptableau`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.141`;
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON `o2ptest`.* TO `o2preport`@`172.26.14.141`;

SHOW GRANTS FOR o2preport@172.26.14.141;

SGOSSPRDO2PAPP01
mysql -u o2preport -h 172.26.14.141 -P 3306 o2ptest -p

REMOTE (SSH TUNNEL):
mysql -u o2preport -h 127.0.0.1 -P 54406 o2ptest -p
